mapper.select: SELECT aid, title, catalog, establishtime, lastmodifytime, introduction, content, markdown FROM article WHERE aid = #{aid}
SELECT aid, title, catalog, establishtime, lastmodifytime, introduction FROM article Limit #{arg0}, #{arg1};
SELECT count(*) FROM article where catalog = #{catalog};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (title, catalog, establishtime, lastmodifytime, introduction, content, markdown) VALUES (#{title}, #{catalog}, #{establishtime}, #{lastmodifytime}, #{introduction}, #{content}, #{markdown})
